FormField::getGenericFieldAttributes ( $  _ignore = array()  )  [protected, inherited]

Return the attributes for an HTML formfield in the " attrib='value' [...]" format

Parameters:
[in] $_ignore Array with attributes names that should be ignored, e.g. for a textarea, the value is not returned as an attribute.
Returns:
Textstring with the HTML code
